title: Creepy Ambiences
description: Creepy ambiences is a collection of 120 high quality dark, tense, oppressive sound atmospheres
longDescription:
This pack includes 120 creepy, spooky, scary textures designed to add a dark suspenseful tone in many kinds of scenarios (sci-fi, horror, industrial, haunted landscapes...) and make the player's experience much more immersive.


Preview:


https://soundcloud.com/marcos-l-964000929/creepy-ambiences?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


https://youtu.be/9rg2aFENsYw
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Horror, sci-fi, scary, dark mood atmospheres
  •  High Quality Sound Tracks
  • Suitable for background and in-game ambience sound tracks


Number of Audio Waves: 120

Number of Audio Cues: 120

Sample rate / bit rate: 16 bit 44.1 Khz

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Minutes of audio provided: 240 min. Each track has a duration of 2 minutes.

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes
